title: MetaStats Entry
description: A MetaStats object representation for statistical analysis

samplePreparationId.description: QBiC internal identifier for preparation samples

sequencingFacilityId.description: Name of sample given by the Sequencing Facility

sampleName.description: ID of the sample written on the tube

individual.description: Individual living organism or cell line

species.description: Scientific name of organism(s) from which the biological material was derived.

extractCode.description: QBiC internal identifier for extract samples

sex.description: Sex of the species of the biological material (if available)

tissue.description: Biological material of the sample like muscle or leaf

analyte.description: Type of molecule extracted from biological material

integrityNumber.description: RIN or DIN of the biological material

fileName.description: Name of the data files for the sample
